text: Ke kaloku wena (Muhammad), gweba phakathi kwabo ngoko uAllâh Akutyhilileyo, ungalandeli iminqweno yabo engento yanto, kodwa ubalumkele bangakujiki bakuphambukise koko uAllâh Akuthumele kuwe. Ukuba bayakutshikilela, yazi ke ngoko ukuba intando ka-Allâh kukubohlwaya ngenxa yezono zabo ezithile. Yaye inene, uninzi lwabantu ngabenzi bobubi
